description: The existing property is a terraced 5 bedroom 'back addition' style period house class C3(a) Dwellinghouses.The proposed building works are for a single storey 'side infill extension' and internal refurbishment.The ground floor extension will infill the passage to the rear and side of the property up to the boundary with 12 Deerbrook Road.The external walls of the extension are to be built in London Stock face bricks to match the existing and incorporating a fixed shaped window within the wall facing the garden.The roof to the extension is to be pitched and consist of a 1m section of traditional tiled roof and 5m of a glazed pitched roof system.The extension will create an open plan kitchen diner at ground floor.The internal refurbishment is to consist of the addition of one bathroom to the top floor, 2 Velux windows in the existing main roof, new patio doors to the existing back addition rear wall into the garden, new heating and plumbing installation, new electrical installation, new kitchen, new floor finishes, painting and decoration and new landscaping to the front and rear gardens.
